# vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ vmnet ](/documentation/vmnet)

- [ vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:) ](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:))

-  vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:) 

Function# vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:)

Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 26.0+

```
func vmnet_network_configuration_create(
    _ mode: vmnet_mode_t,
    _ status: UnsafeMutablePointer<vmnet_return_t>?
) -> vmnet_network_configuration_ref?
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:)#parameters)

`mode`Shared mode or host-only mode.

`status`Optional output parameter, returns status.

## [Return Value](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:)#return-value)

Vmnet network handle on success, otherwise NULL.

## [Discussion](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_create(_:_:)#discussion)

Creates a network configuration object with the specified operating mode.

All other parameters are optional and have the following default value:

- External interface: default interface per the routing table

- NAT44: enabled

- NAT66: enabled

- DHCP: enabled

- DNS proxy: enabled

- Router advertisement: enabled

- IPv4 subnet: a /24 under 192.168/16

- IPv6 prefix: random ULA prefix

- Port forwarding rule: none

- DHCP reservation: none

- MTU: 1500 Use `CFRelease()` to release the network configuration object.
